alert.note: Alert for Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 02 at 12:06AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Florida, including the following county, Lee. * WHEN...Until 130 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1206 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pineland, Pine Island Center, Matlacha, St. James City, Useppa Island and Bokeelia. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
